name: quietness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of making very little noise: This luxury car offers comfort, quietness, and speed. I enjoyed the quietness of the early morning.
the quality of having little activity or excitement and few people: We were struck by the quietness of the town on Sunday.
the quality of not talking very much: I liked her smile and her gentle quietness. See
quiet
More examplesFewer examplesThe relative quietness of today's modern jet engines mean that birds don't hear them coming.There was a moment of quietness in the room.A local pastor described the mood in town as a shocked quietness. There is an awkward quietness among the 11 men who sit waiting in the classroom.
